title: Style of process
context: §601-15 Style of process. The style of process in the state courts shall run in the name of &ldquo;The State of Hawaii&rdquo;, and all prosecutions shall be carried on in the name and by the authority of the State of Hawaii. [L Sp 1959 1st, c 5, §7; Supp, §213-12; HRS §601-15; am L 1972, c 88, §1(g)]
